items.name: Military OneSource
items.desc: official site for military members and families, providing a wide range of resources and support services

items.name: Military.com
items.desc: provides news, benefits information, and resources for military members and their families

items.name: SGLI
items.desc: official site for Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance, providing information on coverage and benefits

items.name: OPM - Military Leave
items.desc: official Office of Personnel Management site for military leave policies and information

items.name: Military Money Manual
items.desc: provides independent financial education and resources for military members and their families

items.name: The Military Wallet
items.desc: provides independent financial resources and tools for military members and their families

items.name: MyPay
items.desc: official online pay management system for military members, retirees, and their families

items.name: Defense Finance Accounting Service (DFAS)
items.desc: official site for military pay information, including pay tables and entitlements

items.name: MilitaryPay
items.desc: official site for military pay information, including basic pay, allowances, and benefits

items.name: IRS Military Site
items.desc: official IRS site for military tax information, including deductions and credits

items.name: Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
items.desc: official site for the Thrift Savings Plan, a retirement savings plan for members of the uniformed services

items.name: H&R Block Military Tax Services
items.desc: official site for H&R Block's military tax services, providing resources and support for military members

items.name: Defense Travel Management Office (DTMO)
items.desc: official site for military travel information, including travel allowances and benefits

items.name: VA Education Benefits
items.desc: official site for military education information, including GI Bill benefits and resources

items.name: Health.mil Psychological Health Resource Center
items.desc: official site for military mental health and psychological health information
